mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Complications surrounding the resolution of the boundary dispute over between John Carter and James Monroe on Short's land: one of the arbitrators was injured and the rest could not ascend the mountain; the matter will be settled by the county surveyor.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
Adams, John, 1735-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1815 June 27, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia] to [William Short], n.p.
